name: Cute Owl Jumper Sweet Candy Edition
name_original: Cute Owl Jumper Sweet Candy Edition
description:
How high can you jump? Cute Owl jumper Sweet Candy Edition is a very addictive jump adventure game. Jump to collect candies. Tilt to move left or right.

Features:
Very cute graphics.
Game Center leaderboards.
Universal game: iPhone, iPad, iPad Mini, iPod Touch.

Enjoy!
